A Queen Is Born is a 2020 Brazilian television series. The premise revolves around aspiring drag queens and drag kings.
Cast
* Phillip Jordan as Adla Davis
* Gloria Groove
* Alexia Twister
* Silvero Pereira as Gisele Almodóvar
